Appiah Ntiaw (amụrụ 1979 na Cape Coast, Ghana), nwetara agụmakwụkwọ na Ghanatta College of Art and Design na Accra na-elekwasị anya na eserese na eserese
O nwere ụmụnne abụọ ndị tọrọ na ụmụnne nwanyị abụọ tọrọ
Ụmụnne ya na-arụ ọrụ agha dị ka ndị na-ahụ maka udo na Liberia ebe otu nwanna nwanyị bi na mama ya, nke ọzọ bi na Cape Coast
Appiah gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 2002 wee nwee ike iru eru maka asọmpi nka afọ nke akpọrọ Ghana Association of Visual Artists.
Ya na enyi ya, o mepụtara ebe ngosi ihe osise
A na-akpọ gallery ahụ Ọdịda Anyanwụ ma dị na Cape Coast, Ghana
Ụlọ ngosi ahụ na-egosi amaokwu dị iche iche nke ihe osise Africa
Appiah na-enyekwa aka ma na-akwado òtù ọrụ ebere dịka African Footprint International na New Life Orphanage na Cape Coast, Ghana
Site na mmụba nke ahịa na nkà ya, ọ malitere ọrụ ọhụrụ na Denmark
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ na imewe na akara Juel Sandberg
Ọ ka na-ere ihe osise ma mara ya maka ụdị ihe osise ya dị iche iche
A na-akọwa ha dị ka ndị na-enye mmetụta na ndụ kwa ụbọchị
Ọ na-ewere ihe ncheta ya banyere Africa na nwata ya ma gbanwee ha ka ha bụrụ ihe osise mara mma
Ọ na-ekwu na Denmark emetụtaghị ụdị nka ya na usoro ya.
